fixes.name: Initial Cash USD (excl Int/FWD)
fixes.dax_expression: IF('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Internal ? (group)] = "external" && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Forward Start ?] = 0, 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM], 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF expression to a DAX IF expression and qualified all column references with the table name. This is row-level logic with no aggregation, so it is implemented as a calculated column.
